languages.text: "Ладно тебе, булыжник. Комморре тебя не сломить! А насчет ненависти — так ты всегда все живое ненавидел, разве нет?"
"Oh, chin up, killjoy. There's no way Commorragh could break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hated all life anyway?"
languages.original_text: "Ладно тебе, булыжник. Комморре тебя не сломить! А насчет ненависти — так ты всегда все живое ненавидел, разве нет?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, chin up, killjoy. There is no way Commorragh can break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hatred all life anyway?"
"Oh, chin up, killjoy. There is no way Commorragh can break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hatred all life anyway?"
"Oh, chin up, killjoy. There's no way Commorragh could break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hated all life anyway?"
"Oh, chin up, killjoy. There's no way Commorragh could break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hated all life anyway?"
"Oh, chin up, killjoy. There's no way Commorragh could break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hated all life anyway?"
"Oh, chin up, killjoy. There's no way Commorragh could break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hated all life anyway?"

languages.text: 「ああ、元気出しなよ、堅物さん。あなたがコモラフに負けるなんてありえない！憎悪だって？あなたは元々ずっとすべての命を憎んでいたんじゃない？」
languages.original_text: "Oh, chin up, killjoy. There's no way Commorragh could break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hated all life anyway?"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、元気出しなよ、堅物さん。あなたがコモラフに負けるなんてありえない！憎悪だって？あなたは元々ずっとすべての命を憎んでいたんじゃない？」

languages.text: "Oh, Kopf hoch, Spielverderber! Commorragh kann Euch unmöglich brechen! Hass, sagt Ihr? Habt Ihr nicht ohnehin schon immer alles Leben gehasst?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, chin up, killjoy. There's no way Commorragh could break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hated all life anyway?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Kopf hoch, Spielverderber! Commorragh kann Euch unmöglich brechen! Hass, sagt Ihr? Habt Ihr nicht ohnehin schon immer alles Leben gehasst?"

languages.text: «No se me venga abajo, aguafiestas. ¡No me creo que Commorragh haya podido con usted! ¿Odio, dice? ¡Pero si ya odiaba antes a todo bicho viviente!».
languages.original_text: "Oh, chin up, killjoy. There's no way Commorragh could break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hated all life anyway?"

traits.locale_text: «No se me venga abajo, aguafiestas. ¡No me creo que Commorragh haya podido con usted! ¿Odio, dice? ¡Pero si ya odiaba antes a todo bicho viviente!».

languages.text: “嘿，打起精神来，泼冷水大师。科摩罗怎么可能打得垮你！你刚刚是不是说‘仇恨’？可你以前不就痛恨着这世上的一切吗？”
languages.original_text: "Oh, chin up, killjoy. There's no way Commorragh could break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hated all life anyway?"

traits.locale_text: “嘿，打起精神来，泼冷水大师。科摩罗怎么可能打得垮你！你刚刚是不是说‘仇恨’？可你以前不就痛恨着这世上的一切吗？”

languages.text: "Biraz canlansana oyunbozan. Commorragh'ın seni yıldırması imkânsız! Nefret mi? Doğduğu günden beri tüm hayattan nefret eden sen değil miydin zaten?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, chin up, killjoy. There's no way Commorragh could break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hated all life anyway?"

traits.locale_text: "Biraz canlan, oyunbozan. Commorragh'ın seni yıldırması imkânsız! Nefret mi? Doğduğu günden beri tüm hayattan nefret eden sen değil miydin zaten?"

languages.original_text: "Oh, chin up, killjoy. There's no way Commorragh could break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hated all life anyway?"

languages.text: « Oh, ressaisissez-vous, espèce de rabat-joie. Commorragh n'a aucune chance de vous briser ! De haine, dites-vous ? Ne haïssez-vous pas depuis toujours toute forme de vie ? »
languages.original_text: "Oh, chin up, killjoy. There's no way Commorragh could break you! Hatred, you say? Haven't you always hated all life anyway?"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, ressaisissez-vous, espèce de rabat-joie. Commorragh n'a aucune chance de vous briser ! De haine, dites-vous ? Ne haïssez-vous pas depuis toujours toute forme de vie ? »
